content:
Certainly! I'll create a page similar to the one shown in the image. The design is simple and clean, featuring a "Hello World!" message in blue and a welcome message in green. Let's implement this using React and Tailwind CSS.



Now, let's update the Index.tsx file to create the page similar to the one in the image:



These changes will create a page that closely resembles the one in the image. The "Hello World!" text will be in blue, and the welcome message will be in green, centered on a white background.
</HST-code>

The page has been created to match the image, with a large blue "Hello World!" heading and a smaller green welcome message.

The deployment failed with the following error from Fly.io:

[ERROR] Deployment failed for 'hst-ai-caeb0e53-5587-48a7-82e1-b8a4467a33ce'. Exit code: 1

Please fix the issue.
